Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) released the notification for TCS NQT (National Qualifier Test) for the July Cycle on 1st June 2023. The last date for applying is 4th July 2023. The Exam will be held on 15th July 2023.
InfyTQ Certification Program, no specific dates released yet. We will update you once they are released.
2023, 2022, 2021 Batch Freshers can hereby apply for the Deloitte Off Campus Drive. Deloitte is also offering IT Internship Jobs and vacancies for entry-level engineers.

Then the most important tool of DevOps is Build Tool that is Jenkins. Do go in depth of this tool as this would be mostly asked in interviews. Then I would suggest to dive into Containerization- Master Docker and do get atleast basic knowledge of Kubernetes. Next is a Configuration Management Tool which can be Chef, Puppet, Ansible or Salt.
You can begin with a Small Project,Have a good Knowledge of the Internet,Programming Language to be Focused On,Getting Familiar With Sensors,Joining an Online Course can Always Help
